Class MolecularGraph

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.chemistry.MolecularGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
Graph<Atom>
public class MolecularGraph extends Object implements Graph<Atom>
Represents a molecule as a graph of atoms and bonds.

Implements Graph to allow graph-theoretic algorithms (DFS, BFS, etc.) to be applied directly to molecular structures.

* @author Silvere Martin-Michiellot
Since:
1.0
Author:
Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
